constituent: forge, metal, gold, grade, staple gun, cruise missile, missile, wind, crotch
koohiiStory1: As a discriminating metalsmith, I use the highest grade metals when forging such precision devices as staple guns and missiles.
koohiiStory2: Metal has to be forged many times over in order to reach a high grade.
words: 鍛える(きたえる): to forge, to drill, to temper, to train, to discipline
